sentence.Network_en: Korea and China are separated by only the Yalu River.
sentence.Network_cn: 朝鲜和中国只隔一条鸭绿江.

sentence.Network_en: A steel railway bridge spans the Yalu River.
sentence.Network_cn: 鸭绿江上有一座钢铁大桥.

sentence.Network_en: North Korea is separated from China by Yalu River.
sentence.Network_cn: 朝鲜和中国由鸭绿江相隔.

means.word_mean: 1. river in eastern Asia; rises in North Korea and flows southwest to Korea Bay (forming part of the border between North Korea and China)

auth_sentence.content: It has a relatively long land border, along the Yalu River, with the Chinese province of Manchuria.
auth_sentence.res_content: It has a relatively long land border, along the Yalu River, with the Chinese province of Manchuria.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It has a relatively long land border, along the Yalu River, with the Chinese province of Manchuria.

auth_sentence.content: The worst flooding is in the north, on the Yalu River, which separates North Korea from China.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: The worst flooding is in the north, on the Yalu River, which separates North Korea from China.

auth_sentence.content: North Korean soldiers regularly fire across the Yalu and beat up Chinese fishermen straying into their territorial waters.
